bibl.title: Paths to Heroization at Plataea.
The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire

bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper appeared as: The New Simonides and Heroization at Plataia, Archaic Greece. New Approaches and New Evidence (Cardiff, 1998) pp. 231-249. - I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 10-18 (in part. 11). - Heroization at Plataea? - Bridging the Gap. - Points of Comparison.
BOEDEKER Deborah, Paths to Heroization at Plataea.
Deborah BOEDEKER and David SIDER (Edd.), The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire (Oxford, 2001) pp. 148-163.
